post.body: did you hear about this? "WSJ: Richardson Withdraws as Commerce Nominee http://tinyurl.com/89l3x7"
no haven't been what's the count at? Also, good to hear Vikes sold out..not that it'd have affected me!
that's what I was going to ask too.. :)
PS: let me know what you think, wrote this up yesterday: http://bit.ly/QOyA
Volvo? man you are an academic at heart...
go here http://www.nytimes.com/pages/weekinreview/
..and lead article is about history of Israel in Middle East--and has a sidebar on @israelconsulate doing a Twitter news conf last Tues!?
great stuff in NYT Wk in Review: Siegel on theories of history, Frank Rich on Bush, loong one by Michael Lewis & David Einhorn...
Zakaria's last 2 guests: Judea Pearl (Daniel's father--and a well-known computer scientist: http://bit.ly/5FbL) & Akbar Ahmed (American U)
Q: what does Joe 6-pack flipping across to CNN make of BHL and his accent? :)
More talk about Iran than any Arab nation wrt Israel/Gaza..need to understand that better
Brilliant PR by IDF: Michael Oren is an officer, just to speak to W media. Got to get a copy of his "6 Days"..np: Richard Haass, then BHL
Going overboard w the Sunday shows..now on to F Zakaria's GPS (CNN): guests incl BHL (!), R Haas
NBC Meet the Press roundtable far superior to ABC This Week..D Sanger (NYT), A Mitchell, J Goldberg (Atlantic mag), H Melhem (al-Arabiya)
Discussion about this idea of putting the stim bill online for a week before the vote. Got to read Sunstein "Republic.com"!!
Watching ABC 'This Week'..George Will & Cokie Roberts are useless, Kat vanden Heuv not much better..where are Zakaria and Joe Klein??
finishing late dinner at Chez Oskar w Kevin & Sharon..finished w some cognac. Unfort too late for Sputnik..
Got a beef patty instead--Jamaican bakery on Flatbush @ Church..as hot & humid in here as Jamaica
Walking across on Church Ave @ Ocean..no doubles @ Ram's Roti! Maybe stop at Ali's on Flatbush
Fire in progress on Caton just south of Prosp. Park tennis ctr..FDNY out in full effect
